phrases: Saucer management funds to be increased.
Do not you need to get dressed?
You are not one to talk.
As long as you are not going to be late.
Is not it the opening ceremony today?
No way, it is still August.
It is earlier than in Tokyo.
Why did not you tell me sooner?
I thought you would know, since it is the same as in elementary school.
You should smile a little more.
The eggs were not even soft-boiled.
I am here to see you.
Sorry, I do not have time, thanks to Dad.
Did you find the lost child?
So you were not a tourist.
Do you know which class you are in?
There are not too many people going from this town.
I hope we are in the same class.
Okay, everyone, be good to her.
Komiya-san, your seat is in the very back of the second row.
Do not you dare touch me.
You could have said something if you knew.
We met by the lake before, right?
I wanted to know why you said what you did.
Komiya-san, let us go home together.
You can call me Koharu, too, then.
Do you live by the lake?
but it is more towards the mountains.
Is it true what you just said?
Did you really just move here?
Did you need something from me?
Tell me straight up what you think.
Excuse me, two fresh ginger ales.
That is okay with you, right?
but it was a huge mess seven years ago.
I saw it on the news, so I kind of remember.
Some things you just have to be there to understand.
A saucer just showed up out of nowhere and parked at the lake.
Yet no one even cares anymore!
But I do not think the townspeople mind it.
It is just been pretending to sit there for seven years.
What is it really up to?
The town's safety is more and more at risk every day.
We have to do something about it before it is too late.
I think the town's as safe as it could be.
The saucer versus a friend in need,
Well, a friend in need, but...
All right then, let us take back the town's safety.
Let us take back our town.
Please do not say my name.
Otherwise they will not get it.
It is fine, I will be fine.
Let us drive out the saucer!
We do not need a saucer in our town!
How long are we doing this?
I think we can get rid of it, with everyone is help.
Because we did not do anything wrong.
We have been friends since we were little.
Let us go to our next plan.
You are here about the saucer?
No, I want to meet straight with the person in charge of the saucer.
We need to talk to the leaders
We need to talk straight to the leaders!
Why did you get in the way?
You cannot call for the leaders at a reception desk.
You used to be able to get to that island on a tour boat, you know?
And now it is off limits, because it is dangerous.
We cannot just leave it as it is.
We have to take it back.
Please do not get mad at Yuzuki.
It is none of your business, Souta.
That is none of your business either.
I am telling you not to cause people trouble.
I bet it is something pointless again.
Why are you doing something so stupid?
It is all the saucer and that girl's fault.
We are going to the island.
I have always been alone anyway.
You are mad at me, are not you?
Why do you want to get rid of the saucer so much?
Seven years ago, the saucer came,
There are still some things that have not gone back to how they were.
They used to launch fireworks from the lake.
It was not a big deal,
but the fireworks were really pretty shining on the lake.
It did not even get close.
Let us get rid of the saucer.
We will have to find more people to help us.
Nonoka, have you been keeping your promise to me?
What do I have to do?
We want to make the saucer leave the city.
Nonoka, do you hate the saucer?
but I want to help my friend somehow.
Sure, just wait a little longer.
Next episode of Celestial Method : Where Memories Live.
